snippet.title: Warren Buffett Berkshire Hathaway 1980 Shareholder Letter
snippet.description:
Berkshire Hathaway has published shareholder letters written by Warren Buffett's own hand since 1977. This is the letter for the 1980 operating year and was written on February 27, 1981.

Berkshire Hathaway stock currently trades under symbols brk.a and brk.b. 
Brk.a retains it's original unsplit status.

Follow this shareholder video series to gain insight into the infamous Warren Buffett portfolio and learn to pick your own Warren Buffet stocks!

00:00 Intro
21:00 Data Table 01
28:46 Data Table 02

The 1980 Berkshire Hathaway Shareholder Letter:
https://www.berkshirehathaway.com/letters/1980.html

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-wIdZ5MY__UT4WFztfW3dw?sub_confirmation=1
